input: <web-search>Find current information about: landing page strategy gallery pricing table responsive design patterns 2026</web-search>
output:
Based on current 2026 research, here are the key strategies and design patterns for landing pages with gallery pricing tables and responsive design:

## **Modern Landing Page Strategy (2026)**

**Core Principles:**
- **Minimal, focused layouts** - Strip away unnecessary elements, use generous whitespace, and feature a single prominent CTA
- **Mobile-first architecture** - Fast loading, adaptive layouts, thumb-friendly buttons, and minimalist content
- **CLEAR framework** - Clarity, Layout, Emotion, Action, Relevance to drive conversions

## **Key Design Trends**

1. **Micro-interactions** - Meaningful motion in CTA hovers, scroll reveals, and animated feature icons
2. **Expressive typography** - Oversized fonts with concise, high-impact headlines and scannable copy
3. **Dark mode support** - High-contrast themes improving accessibility and reducing eye strain
4. **Interactive product demos** - Embedded previews, video demos, and guided tours in hero sections

## **Pricing Table Best Practices**

- Pricing pages are among the most visited but often overlooked pages
- Gallery-style pricing displays with clear tier differentiation
- Mobile-responsive card layouts that stack vertically on smaller screens
- Interactive elements to help buyers compare features

## **Responsive Design Patterns**

- **Adaptive layouts** that adjust to any screen size automatically
- **Performance optimization** crucial for mobile retention and conversion rates
- **Built-in responsive frameworks** from platforms like Shopify and Unbounce
- **App-like mobile experiences** for seamless cross-device functionality

## **Recommended Tools**

- **Unbounce** - Customizable conversion-optimized templates with drag-and-drop builder
- **Swipe Pages** - Highly responsive with mobile-only landing pages and app-like experiences

**Sources:**
- [20 Landing Page Examples That Actually Convert in 2026](https://www.superside.com/blog/landing-page-design-examples)
- [Landing Page Design Trends by Industry (2026 Guide)](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-design-trends)
- [9 Landing Page Trends For 2026](https://www.involve.me/blog/landing-page-trends)
- [10 SaaS Landing Page Trends for 2026](https://www.saasframe.io/blog/10-saas-landing-page-trends-for-2026-with-real-examples)
- [Top Landing Page Design Trends for B2B SaaS in 2026](https://www.saashero.net/content/top-landing-page-design-trends/)
- [The 7 Best Landing Page Builders For 2026](https://www.searchenginejournal.com/the-7-best-landing-page-builders-for-2026/561935/)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: 한국 정부사이트 PDF 다운로드 curl SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL 해결 2026</web-search>
output:
curl을 사용하여 한국 정부 사이트에서 PDF를 다운로드할 때 SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL 오류를 해결하는 방법을 정리했습니다.

## 주요 원인

이 오류는 OpenSSL 3.x 버전에서 서버가 SSL 연결을 제대로 종료하지 않을 때 (close notify 없이) 주로 발생합니다. 특히 오래된 서버나 정부 사이트에서 자주 발생할 수 있습니다.

## 해결 방법

### 1. CA 인증서 추가
한국 정부 사이트는 특정 CA(인증 기관)의 인증서를 사용하므로, 해당 CA 인증서를 시스템에 추가해야 합니다.

```bash
# CA 인증서를 curl에 추가
curl --cacert /path/to/ca-certificate.crt https://government-site.go.kr/file.pdf -o file.pdf
```

### 2. 임시 해결 (테스트용)
```bash
# 인증서 검증 비활성화 (보안상 권장하지 않음)
curl -k https://government-site.go.kr/file.pdf -o file.pdf
```

### 3. 방화벽 설정
- 인증 기관 URL과 PORT를 방화벽에서 허용
- OCSP(Online Certificate Status Protocol) 포트도 열어야 할 수 있음

### 4. OpenSSL 설정 조정
오래된 서버와의 호환성을 위해 OpenSSL 설정을 조정할 수 있습니다.

한국 정부 사이트의 경우, 해당 사이트가 사용하는 SSL 인증서의 발급 기관을 확인하고 필요한 CA 인증서를 시스템에 추가하는 것이 가장 안전한 해결 방법입니다.

## Sources:
- [OpenSSL SSL_read: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL with OpenSSL ≥ 3.2 + old servers · Issue #17471 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/17471)
- [SSL 보안서버 인증서 오류 및 장애 해결방안](https://help.ucert.co.kr/42355d89-68ba-41d4-ba98-b9a2b2e15688)
- [OpenSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection · Issue #14154 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/14154)
- [curl 에 신뢰하는 인증기관 인증서(CA Cert) 추가하기](https://www.lesstif.com/gitbook/curl-ca-cert-15892500.html)
- [리눅스 curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate](https://velog.io/@hyojinnnnnan/%EB%A6%AC%EB%88%85%EC%8A%A4-curl-60-SSL-certificate-problem-unable-to-get-local-issuer-certificate)

input: <web-search>How do I find information about: pendlay row deficit tutorial youtube 2026?</web-search>
output:
Based on my search, here's what I found about deficit Pendlay rows:

## What is the Deficit Pendlay Row?

The deficit Pendlay row is a variation of the bent-over row where you stand on an elevated platform (like weight plates) to increase the range of motion. This allows for a deeper stretch and greater muscle stimulation in your back.

## Key Technique Points

- Stand on a raised platform behind the barbell
- Keep your torso parallel to the floor throughout
- Lower the weights to the floor with each rep
- The increased ROM provides better muscle stretch and activation

## Important Considerations

This exercise requires:
- Excellent mobility and hamstring flexibility
- Good body awareness
- Consider filming yourself or having someone check your form from the side

While I found comprehensive written guides and some TikTok content on deficit Pendlay rows, specific YouTube tutorials from 2026 weren't directly listed in the search results. You may want to search YouTube directly for the most current video tutorials.

## Sources:
- [Deficit Pendlay Rows Guide: How To, Benefits, Programming, Variations](https://fitnessvolt.com/deficit-pendlay-rows-guide/)
- [How to Do the Pendlay Row for Back Size and Stronger Lifts | BarBend](https://barbend.com/pendlay-row/)
- [How to do the Pendlay Row: Form, Muscles Worked, Pro Tips](https://backmusclesolutions.com/blogs/the-ql-blawg/pendlay-row)
- [Pendlay Row: How-to, Benefits, Variations, Mistakes & More](https://www.hevyapp.com/exercises/pendlay-row/)
- [Good Idea or Bad? Deficit Pendlay Row - Christian Thibaudeau Coaching](https://t-nation.com/t/good-idea-or-bad-deficit-pendlay-row/242657)
- [How to Do the Pendlay Row: Expert Tips | Garage Gym Reviews](https://www.garagegymreviews.com/pendlay-row)
- [Deficit Row | TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/discover/deficit-row)
- [Pendlay Row: The Best Back Exercise You're (Probably) Not Doing – Transparent Labs](https://www.transparentlabs.com/blogs/all/pendlay-row-guide)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: document image augmentation OCR text similarity 2024</web-search>
output:
Based on the latest research from 2024, here are the key developments in document image augmentation for OCR and text similarity:

## Key Approaches

**Generative Data Augmentation**
- ScrabbleGAN is being used to generate synthetic training images by replicating document fonts, particularly effective for traditional OCR models like KerasOCR

**Multi-Modal Augmentation (OCR2SEQ)**
- Novel approach combining image and text augmentation specifically for sequence-to-sequence models
- Simulates realistic text extraction errors to create diverse training scenarios
- Particularly effective for sparse character sets and specialized vocabularies

**TextImage Augmentation**
- Applies text-level augmentations (Random Insertion, Deletion, Swap, Stopword Replacement) to text lines
- Blacks out corresponding image regions and inpaints them
- Creates datasets with semantically similar text but visually distorted images

**Scene Text Recognition (STRAug)**
- Specialized augmentation library with 36 functions in 8 groups
- Designed specifically for text recognition challenges (different from general object recognition)

## Text Similarity Evaluation

Recent research uses **Sentence-BERT (SBERT)** with multilingual models like MiniLM-L12-v2 to compute cosine similarity between OCR outputs and ground truth, moving beyond simple character-level metrics to semantic similarity.

## Popular Tools & Libraries

- **docTR**: High-performing OCR library with built-in augmentation support
- **STRAug**: Specialized augmentation for scene text recognition
- **PreP-OCR**: Complete pipeline for document restoration and enhanced OCR accuracy

Sources:
- [Leveraging Transformer-Based OCR Model with Generative Data Augmentation](https://www.mdpi.com/2079-9292/14/1/5)
- [Introducing TextImage Augmentation for Document Images](https://huggingface.co/blog/doc_aug_hf_alb)
- [Advancing machine learning with OCR2SEQ](https://journalofbigdata.springeropen.com/articles/10.1186/s40537-024-00927-4)
- [Effective Data Augmentation for OCR](https://towardsdatascience.com/effective-data-augmentation-for-ocr-8013080aa9fa/)
- [GitHub - mindee/doctr](https://github.com/mindee/doctr)
- [GitHub - roatienza/straug](https://github.com/roatienza/straug)
- [Printed document layout analysis and OCR system](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-025-07439-y)
- [PreP-OCR: Document Image Restoration Pipeline](https://arxiv.org/html/2505.20429v1)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: CFTC commitments of traders current week report 2025 download txt file</web-search>
output:
Based on my search, here's how to access the current week's CFTC Commitments of Traders report in text file format:

## Key Details:

**Release Schedule:** COT reports are released every Friday at 3:30 PM Eastern time with data from the previous Tuesday.

**Where to Download Text Files:**

1. **Official CFTC COT Page:** Visit the main page for all formats and latest reports
   - https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/index.htm

2. **Direct Text File Access:** For specific report categories (like "Other" combined format):
   - https://www.cftc.gov/dea/futures/other_sf.htm

3. **Public Reporting Portal:** Interactive access to current and historical data:
   - https://publicreporting.cftc.gov/stories/s/Commitments-of-Traders/r4w3-av2u/

**Report Types Available:**
- Short format and long format reports
- Multiple categories: Legacy, Disaggregated, Traders in Financial Futures (TFF)
- Available as text files (.txt) for download

**Note:** There was a publication gap in October-November 2025 due to federal appropriations issues, but reporting has resumed with the backlog cleared by late December 2025.

Sources:
- [Commitments of Traders | CFTC](https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/index.htm)
- [Release Schedule | CFTC](https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/ReleaseSchedule/index.htm)
- [CFTC Commitments of Traders Long Report - Other (Combined)](https://www.cftc.gov/dea/futures/other_sf.htm)
- [Commitments of Traders | The Commodities Futures Trading Commission](https://publicreporting.cftc.gov/stories/s/Commitments-of-Traders/r4w3-av2u/)
- [About the COT Reports | CFTC](https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/AbouttheCOTReports/index.htm)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: 한국 정부사이트 PDF 다운로드 curl SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL 해결 2026</web-search>
output:
한국 정부사이트에서 PDF 다운로드 시 발생하는 `curl SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL` 오류에 대한 정보를 정리했습니다.

## 주요 원인

1. **서버 측 SSL 연결 종료 문제**: 서버가 SSL 연결을 제대로 종료하지 않을 때(no "close notify") 발생
2. **OpenSSL 3.2+ 호환성**: OpenSSL 3.2 이상 버전과 오래된 서버 간의 호환성 문제
3. **CA 인증서 검증 실패**: curl이 한국 정부사이트의 인증서를 검증할 수 없는 경우

## 해결 방법

### 1. CA 인증서 추가
```bash
# 신뢰하는 인증기관 목록에 추가
curl --cacert /path/to/ca-bundle.crt <URL>
```

### 2. 인증서 검증 우회 (테스트용)
```bash
# 보안상 권장하지 않지만 테스트용으로 사용 가능
curl -k <URL>
# 또는
curl --insecure <URL>
```

### 3. 방화벽/네트워크 설정
- 인증 기관(CA) URL과 PORT를 방화벽에서 오픈
- 필요한 CA 인증서를 시스템에 설치

### 4. 기타 확인 사항
- 시스템 날짜/시간 정확성 확인
- OpenSSL 버전 확인: `curl --version`
- 서버 인증서 만료 여부 확인

한국 정부사이트는 특정 SSL/TLS 설정이나 오래된 인증서 체인을 사용할 수 있어 최신 curl/OpenSSL과 호환성 문제가 발생할 수 있습니다.

Sources:
- ["OpenSSL SSL_read: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL" with OpenSSL ≥ 3.2 + old servers · Issue #17471 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/17471)
- [SSL 보안서버 인증서 오류 및 장애 해결방안](https://help.ucert.co.kr/42355d89-68ba-41d4-ba98-b9a2b2e15688)
- [OpenSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection · Issue #14154 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/14154)
- [curl 에 신뢰하는 인증기관 인증서(CA Cert) 추가하기](https://www.lesstif.com/gitbook/curl-ca-cert-15892500.html)
- [[리눅스] curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate](https://velog.io/@hyojinnnnnan/%EB%A6%AC%EB%88%85%EC%8A%A4-curl-60-SSL-certificate-problem-unable-to-get-local-issuer-certificate)

trajectory.content: I'll search for current information about resolving SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL issues when downloading PDFs from Korean government websites using curl.

한국 정부사이트에서 PDF 다운로드 시 발생하는 `curl SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL` 오류에 대한 정보를 정리했습니다.

## 주요 원인

1. **서버 측 SSL 연결 종료 문제**: 서버가 SSL 연결을 제대로 종료하지 않을 때(no "close notify") 발생
2. **OpenSSL 3.2+ 호환성**: OpenSSL 3.2 이상 버전과 오래된 서버 간의 호환성 문제
3. **CA 인증서 검증 실패**: curl이 한국 정부사이트의 인증서를 검증할 수 없는 경우

## 해결 방법

### 1. CA 인증서 추가
```bash
# 신뢰하는 인증기관 목록에 추가
curl --cacert /path/to/ca-bundle.crt <URL>
```

### 2. 인증서 검증 우회 (테스트용)
```bash
# 보안상 권장하지 않지만 테스트용으로 사용 가능
curl -k <URL>
# 또는
curl --insecure <URL>
```

### 3. 방화벽/네트워크 설정
- 인증 기관(CA) URL과 PORT를 방화벽에서 오픈
- 필요한 CA 인증서를 시스템에 설치

### 4. 기타 확인 사항
- 시스템 날짜/시간 정확성 확인
- OpenSSL 버전 확인: `curl --version`
- 서버 인증서 만료 여부 확인

한국 정부사이트는 특정 SSL/TLS 설정이나 오래된 인증서 체인을 사용할 수 있어 최신 curl/OpenSSL과 호환성 문제가 발생할 수 있습니다.

Sources:
- ["OpenSSL SSL_read: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL" with OpenSSL ≥ 3.2 + old servers · Issue #17471 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/17471)
- [SSL 보안서버 인증서 오류 및 장애 해결방안](https://help.ucert.co.kr/42355d89-68ba-41d4-ba98-b9a2b2e15688)
- [OpenSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection · Issue #14154 · curl/curl](https://github.com/curl/curl/issues/14154)
- [curl 에 신뢰하는 인증기관 인증서(CA Cert) 추가하기](https://www.lesstif.com/gitbook/curl-ca-cert-15892500.html)
- [[리눅스] curl: (60) SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate](https://velog.io/@hyojinnnnnan/%EB%A6%AC%EB%88%85%EC%8A%A4-curl-60-SSL-certificate-problem-unable-to-get-local-issuer-certificate)

input: <web-search>How do I find information about: pendlay row deficit tutorial youtube 2026?</web-search>
output:
I found information about deficit Pendlay row tutorials. Here's what's available:

## Deficit Pendlay Row Overview

The **deficit Pendlay row** is a variation of the standard Pendlay row where you stand on an elevated platform (like weight plates) to increase the range of motion. This allows for:
- Greater stretch of the back muscles
- Increased muscle stimulation
- Enhanced back thickness and strength development

## Key Features

The exercise involves:
- Standing on an elevated surface
- Maintaining torso parallel to the floor
- Lowering the barbell to the ground with each rep
- Starting each rep from a dead stop (like a deadlift)

## Tutorial Resources

While I didn't find specific YouTube tutorials from 2026 in the search results, there are:
- Multiple written guides with detailed form instructions
- TikTok videos demonstrating the exercise technique
- Comprehensive tutorials from fitness experts

For the most current YouTube video tutorials, I recommend searching directly on YouTube using terms like "deficit Pendlay row tutorial" or "deficit Pendlay row form guide" to find the latest video content.

Sources:
- [Deficit Pendlay Rows Guide: How To, Benefits, Programming, Variations](https://fitnessvolt.com/deficit-pendlay-rows-guide/)
- [How to Do the Pendlay Row for Back Size and Stronger Lifts | BarBend](https://barbend.com/pendlay-row/)
- [How to do the Pendlay Row: Form, Muscles Worked, Pro Tips](https://backmusclesolutions.com/blogs/the-ql-blawg/pendlay-row)
- [Pendlay Row: How-to, Benefits, Variations, Mistakes & More](https://www.hevyapp.com/exercises/pendlay-row/)
- [Good Idea or Bad? Deficit Pendlay Row - Christian Thibaudeau Coaching - T NATION](https://t-nation.com/t/good-idea-or-bad-deficit-pendlay-row/242657)
- [How to Do the Pendlay Row: Expert Tips | Garage Gym Reviews](https://www.garagegymreviews.com/pendlay-row)
- [Pendlay Row: The Best Back Exercise You're (Probably) Not Doing – Transparent Labs](https://www.transparentlabs.com/blogs/all/pendlay-row-guide)

input: <web-search>Find current information about: CFTC commitments of traders current week report 2025 download txt file</web-search>
output:
Based on the search results, here's how to access the current CFTC Commitments of Traders reports for 2025:

## Download Options for COT Reports

**Main Sources:**

1. **Official CFTC Public Reporting Environment** - The primary platform where you can customize queries and export data in various formats including text files:
   - Access at: https://publicreporting.cftc.gov/stories/s/r4w3-av2u

2. **CFTC Market Reports Page** - The main landing page for all COT reports:
   - https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/index.htm

3. **Direct Archive Access** - Individual reports are published in HTML format at paths like:
   - `/sites/default/files/files/dea/cotarchives/2025/options/`

**Report Schedule:**
- Data collected: Tuesday
- Data submitted by firms: Wednesday morning
- Reports released: Friday afternoon (after verification)

**How to Get TXT Files:**
Visit the Public Reporting Environment where you can customize your query and export the data in text format. The CFTC provides both weekly static reports and the ability to download historical data compressed within annual files.

Sources:
- [Commitments of Traders | CFTC](https://www.cftc.gov/MarketReports/CommitmentsofTraders/index.htm)
- [Commitments of Traders | Public Reporting](https://publicreporting.cftc.gov/stories/s/Commitments-of-Traders/r4w3-av2u/)
- [CFTC COT Reports Archives](https://www.cftc.gov/sites/default/files/files/dea/cotarchives/2025/options/)
- [COT Report - Free CFTC Data & Analysis Tools](https://cot-reports.com/)
